title: Chapter 677 - A Chance Encounter With An Old Acquaintance
body:
Chapter 677 - A Chance Encounter With An Old Acquaintance

Dust and smoke permeated the air.

A destructive current of sword qi swept outward.

A new, perfectly straight, massive sword scar formed alongside the vast chasm, extending far into the distance.

It was a startling sight.

In one slash, he’d defeated the joint attack of four Spiritual Incarnation cultivators!

Its power was enough to terrify even gods and ghosts!

Xuan Zhi’s mind went blank, and her heart trembled.

Earlier, when she sensed that Su Yi had already broken into the Spiritual Manifestation Realm, she realized that he wasn’t the same as a few months prior.

However, she could never have guessed that Su Yi would become this terrifyingly strong after his breakthrough!

“How… How could he be so strong?” the distant red-robed elder shrieked in alarm.

His hair was disheveled, he was covered in blood, and he was already severely injured.

His three companions had all been so thoroughly brutalized that it was painful to even look at them.

Su Yi paid none of this any heed. He just continued ahead.

“Run!”

The bony old woman rose and attempted to flee.

Boom!

A streak of sword qi accompanied by heaven-shaking booms swept through the sky.
